Posts.Content: I had the same procedure(lumpectomy) done in 2002. There was little to no pain for the lumpectomy. So hang in there !!!!
Posts.Title: Sentinel Node Biopsy

Posts.Content: Sharon, thank you for the response. It was VERY encouraging. (I realized I made a typo...not 23 years 2-3 years). I really need to hear good stories right now and yours fit the bill. I know there are things I can do for myself. I'm loosing weight too fast and I concentrating on eating really good qualtiy of food. That's a lot for me right now. But I know I'm getting better...less fear, etc. Thank you again. Your reply really helps. Patricia
Posts.Title: Met to Bone, Liver, Lung

Posts.Content: Three weeks ago I received the bad news that the cancer had spread to my liver and lungs. I am scared to death. My dr. gives me 23 years. I would love to connect with anyone else with this diagnosis
Posts.Title: Met to Bone, Liver, Lung
